headline: Carrier Unveils TechVantage Initiative and Major Investment in its U.S. Workforce: Aims to Strengthen Highly Skilled U.S. Workforce with 1,000 Hires and Training for 100,000 Technicians
summary: PALM BEACH GARDENS, Fla., Jan. 13, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Carrier Global Corporation , global leader in intelligent climate and energy solutions, today announced the launch of its Carrier TechVantage...
